${modID}:Advantage.NAME: Advantage
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage, gain #b
#yDexterity.

${modID}:BadAttitude.NAME: BadAttitude
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a power, ALL enemies gain #b
#yPoison.

${modID}:BigTalker.NAME: Big Talker
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a skill, apply #b
#yDemoralize to ALL enemies.

${modID}:BornOnThird.NAME: Born On Third
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, add #b
random Skill card(s) to your hand.

${modID}:CharismaForm.NAME: Charisma Form
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, gain #b
#yConfidence. Your maximum Confidence is 3.

${modID}:Confidence.NAME: Confidence
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase all non-damage and non-Block card effects by #b
. Every time you would gain a stack after the first, instead heal 1 HP.

${modID}:Demoralize.NAME: Demoralize
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you deal unblocked attack damage, gain #b
#yStrength until end of turn and enemy loses #b
#yStrength until end of turn.

${modID}:Entitlement.NAME: Entitlement
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, draw #b
card(s)

${modID}:ImperiousAffect.NAME: Imperious Affect
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage, apply #b
#yVulnerable.

${modID}:Inheritance.NAME: Inheritance
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a power, draw #b
card(s).

${modID}:MakingDonations.NAME: Making Donations
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a card is exhausted, gain #b
#yBlock.

${modID}:Narcissism.NAME: Narcissism
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, gain #b
#yDexterty and #b
#yStrength.

${modID}:Patron.NAME: Patron
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a power, add #b
random power card(s) into your hand.

${modID}:PenPals.NAME: Pen Pals
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a card, deal #b
damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:PracticedAffect.NAME: Practiced Affect
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a skill, gain #b
#yBlock.

${modID}:Schadenfreude.NAME: Schadenfreude
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an enemy receives a debuff, gain #b
#yBlock.

${modID}:ShoppingSpree.NAME: Shopping Spree
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a power, gain #b
#yBlock.

${modID}:SillyAffect.NAME: Silly Affect
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage, apply #b
#yWeak.

${modID}:SocialClimber.NAME: Social Climber
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a skill that costs zero, draw #b
card(s).

${modID}:SpectralDisposition.NAME: Spectral Disposition
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, return #b
random card(s) from your exhaust pile to your hand.

${modID}:SpectralFog.NAME: Spectral Fog
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a card is exhausted, ALL enemies lose #b
HP.

${modID}:StepAhead.NAME: Step Ahead
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a card, gain #b
#yBlock.

${modID}:WeightRoom.NAME: Weight Room
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a skill this turn, gain #b
#yStrength.
